text: Wo ruci shi nimen [musilin] chengwei yige zhengyi [huo youxiu] de minzu, yibian nimen wei shiren zuozheng, er shizhe [mu sheng] wei nimen zuozheng. Wo yi ni [mu sheng] yuanlai suo dui de chaoxiang wei chaoxiang [zhu][ru zai tian fang ding wei chaoxiang qian, libai shi chaoxiang yelusaleng], zhi wei bianren shei shi zhuisui shizhe [mu sheng] de, shei shi beiqi shizhe de. Zhe que shi jiannan de, dan dui huode an la yindao zhe ze bu nan. An la jue bu hui shi nimen de xinyang [ru zai tian fang ding wei chaoxiang qian, mianxiang yelusaleng de libai] tulao. An la dui renlei que shi ren'ai de, te ci de.
